page.title: 13CROPS
page.content: The farms mostly grow{winter wheat}or {barley}with{oil seed rape}grown as a break crop. The rape is grown for its oil but is also a fertilizer when ploughed back into the soil. It is not disease resistant and must be sprayed many times. Mellow Purgess is a fruit farm growing 6 acres of{Coxes Orange {Pippin}and 27 acres of wheat/rape. Each wheat growing farm has its own combine harvester and one has two. The farmer at Place Farm also has a farm at Blackmore and he says that the harvest is ready a fortnight before Blackmore because of the soil, known as{hot soil,}and the high flat location of Doddinghurst.
